documents.document: Good deed done for the day. 2 packed buses went straight past so I ordered an Uber. Offered a couple of strangers a lift into the city. ðŸ˜‡

Wearing pants on a day like today was so stupid. I'm gonna have wet pants all day. Bare legs are easier to dry. Ugh!

Tonights motto: fuck my life. Hopefully sleep helps. Need my brain to switch off, way too much going on up there (for a change)

@thekiwicanary that's also why this system works better. The capsicums will still be fresh for Tuesday then we get something new on wed
@thekiwicanary we buy on Fridays. That way we make a weeks worth of meals like normal but we don't get sick of it and end up buying daily
